item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go for a bike ride on the Nashua River Rail Trail. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.  This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.   I thought that we would bike for about an hour and a half, then grab lunch in the small restaurant in Pepperell MA, then get back on our bikes and head out to the end of the trail in Nashua, then back to our cars.

We will meet at 10:00 am at the Depot Rd, Hollis NH  location.  Please follow these directions.  Take route 111 West into Hollis.  Once in Hollis, take route 111 East.  The trail is about ¼ mile up the road.  Look for the Amerigas propane tank, the trail is right next to it. 

Please remember to bring your sunscreen, insect repellent and plenty of fluids.

This event is at no cost! I hope to see you there!

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

 

Location: Depot Rd, Hollis NH
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a white Toyota Corolla

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Biking and Lunch on the Nashua River Rail Trail
